short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy way to search multiple words in the document.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is multi words search tool.

Lets say you want to find some words in web page.
You can still use Ctrl+f.
But if you want to find 10 words in the page at the same time?

Here is the solution. 
You just type multi words in the box and let this tool search them.
We will highlight words simultaneously.
